DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect exercise perform monitor physiotherapist self perform home reading booklet exercise orientation patient nonspecific low back pain . A prospective randomize trial perform 44 patient . G1 patient receive physiotherapist orientation , G2 patient receive booklet exercise self perform exercise . Pain intensity Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) , quality life SF-36 measure . Results : Pain intensity low G1 G2 6 12 week . Quality life well G1 . The exercise orientation physiotherapist promote best effect self perform exercise .
DOC.detailed_description: After approval Ethics Committee sign consent form , prospective , randomized trial perform 44 patient chronic nonspecific low back pain ( lasting longer 3 month ) , pain intensity great 3 visual analogue scale age > 18 year . Patients renal gastrointestinal disease , simultaneously submit another type physical therapy , cognitive impairment , pregnant woman exclude . All patient receive exercise booklet consist stretch strengthen muscle . G1 patient orientate physiotherapist performance exercise week , use booklet , patient G2 ( n=22 ) receive booklet self perform exercise without orientation physiotherapist . Everyone perform exercise day home . Pain intensity VAS , quality life SF-36 measure start treatment ( T0 ) , 6 ( T6 ) 12 ( T12 ) week . Side effect record . Acetaminophen ( 4 g / day ) could use necessary . The sample size provide SAS 8.0 , SPSS 15.0 program . To detect difference pain intensity 3 group VAS , 95 % power ( estimate SD= 2.0 ) , alpha level set 0.05 , sample 16 . The program use statistical analysis SAS 8.0 , SPSS 15.0 . The test use Student 's T compare age patient , chi-square compare gender analgesic complementation , Mann Whitney test pain intensity quality life .
DOC.criteria: chronic nonspecific low back pain ( lasting longer 3 month ) , pain intensity great 3 visual analogue scale age > 18 year Patients renal gastrointestinal disease , simultaneously submit another type physical therapy , cognitive impairment , pregnant woman exclude
